Text:
Thanks for all of the high qualitu movies man

Pls help me. I have downloaded many of your posted movies; however they are in mkv format. I used VSO Convert X to DV but the quality of the DVD became worst.

Can you pls let me know thebest software so that I can convert mkv videos to dvd with no loss in quality??

Any feedback will be much appreciated...

@rick_hays have you tried the new version (5) of convertx? that, in my opinion, is far superior than the previous versions. i was searching all over the internet for a better solution earlier this year but now convertx works great for me.
